title: Reinstall Help
body: I have uninstalled League but want to reinstall it. First i used the windows uninstall tool then I deleted the Riot games folder in my C drive. After this I checked the registry and there was no riot games folder to delete so I left it alone. Now every time I try to install league it tells me "The older version of League of Legends cannot be removed. Contact your technical support group."

replies.body:
It sounds like there may have been some corrupted or missing files that stuck around. I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) After you've installed the H.R.T., run it and select the 'reinstall' feature and be sure to check the extra box for 'clean uninstall'. Let this complete its process and it should have cleared the issue for you.

Let me know if you continue to see issues.
